DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Alabama Veterans Rural Health Initiative good understand access barrier health care enhance veteran enrollment engagement health care service veteran reside rural area . It describe intervention adaptable use VA facility serve veteran rural setting , importantly , study improve understand barrier care evaluate method enhance access care . The anticipated impact veteran rural area previously under-utilizing VA service receive attend health care appointment . This gain may improve preventative primary care health care reduce long term health care morbidity , expense burden . This study may also identify previously unknown barrier care surmount innovative access health care delivery approach . DOC.detailed_description: PHASE I I . Primary Hypothesis : Compared veteran randomize control condition ( Treatment Usual ; TAU ) , veteran receive enhance enrollment engagement intervention ( EEE - patient navigation , motivational interviewing , education ) , significantly likely attend VA clinic appointment within 6 month comprehensive baseline evaluation . PHASE II I . Primary Hypothesis : Compared veteran randomize control condition ( Outreach C - education ) , veteran receive enhance enrollment engagement ( EEE ) intervention ( Outreach A - patient navigation , motivational interviewing , education ) , significantly likely attend VA clinic appointment within 6 month comprehensive baseline evaluation . II . Secondary Hypothesis : Compared veteran randomize control condition ( Outreach C ) , veteran receive patient navigation education ( Outreach B ) significantly likely attend VA clinic appointment within 6 month comprehensive baseline evaluation . III . Tertiary Hypothesis : Compared veteran randomize patient navigation education ( Outreach B ) , veteran receive EEE intervention ( Outreach A ) significantly likely attend VA clinic appointment within 6 month comprehensive baseline evaluation .
DOC.criteria: Veterans live rural Alabama county either never enrol previously enrol access VA 2 year Signed informed consent Any race , social class ethnicity Pending active legal charge current/expected incarceration
